name: Six Sided Dilemma
description:
Short but hard top-down shooter.
You control a die that shoots dice at more dice.

Instructions and info:
WASD or arrow keys to move.
Aim with mouse.
Hold left click to charge shot, release to fire.
Esc or Q to pause.

Health of each die is show by the number of dots it has.
The lower health a die has, the larger it is
White dice will bounce off of walls, losing one health each bounce.
The white dice you throw hurt all other dice.
Red dice hurt you.
